pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 4, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

Alma, Quebec

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Collège d’Alma, and make a skills and training announcement to highlight Budget 2019’s Canada Training Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Collège d’Alma
675, boulevard Auger Ouest

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit
  • Open coverage for announcement and media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive to Door 4 at avenue Champagnat no later than 3:15 p.m.

Jonquière, Quebec

6:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Chambre de commerce et d’industrie du Saguenay–Le Fjord’s Gala du mérite économique 2019, and deliver remarks.

Delta Hotels Saguenay Conference Centre
2675, boulevard du Royaume

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the main lobby of the Delta Hotel Saguenay no later than 6:00 p.m.
